content: Even though we spent all our money on advertising, now we have nothing left...
I'm <color=#599d63>Glenn</color>, a shopkeeper at <color=#599d63>Le Tao Shop</color>.
The Joy Shop is right ahead, you can't miss my big tail! I'm heading back now~
Oh no no, Glenn will work hard to get the best value products to bring everyone great deals!

Why don't you <color=#4cb4b0>take a stroll around</color> and get a feel for this place? You might run into other residents too - perfect chance to get to know everyone! If you get tired from walking, come find me at the Happy Shop!
I need to sort through the resources that Kurt and Huyoulang collected, so I can't keep you company.
I'm so so so happy you could come~
<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>, <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>, over here, over here, I'm right here~
